**The Wondrous Treasure Scripture of the Three Primes and Boundless Longevity of the Supreme Cavern Mystery**

At that time, the Supreme Dao Lord was expounding the Dao in a great assembly within the Palace of the Three Primes. Among the assembly was a perfected one named Yike, whose wisdom and fearlessness were boundless. Rising from his seat, he approached with dignified steps, knelt, and inquired of the essential teachings: "I do not yet understand—from whence do all dharmas arise? And once arisen, how may one cultivate contemplative practice to attain the Dao?"

Having spoken thus, he stood solemnly.

The Supreme Dao Lord stroked the table and smiled faintly, saying: "All dharmas of the Three Realms arise from the Dao. If you seek the Dao, you must cultivate contemplative wisdom. As contemplative wisdom grows, you gradually approach the Eternal Dao. The Eternal Dao is boundless, and its practices are not singular. If you wish to know them, listen with single-minded focus—there are dozens of matters beyond reckoning.

The Dao says: The *Dongxuan Sutra* is the source of Heaven and Earth, the origin of the Dao and virtue, revered by the highest sages, and feared by ghosts and spirits. Its height reaches beyond the Nine Heavens, and its depth penetrates below the Nine Earths. Myriad transformations and infinite changes of the Dao are fully contained within it. If one can receive, uphold, read, and recite this sutra with an unwavering mind, they will attain boundless wisdom, accumulate boundless good causes, eradicate boundless karmic obstacles, dispel boundless afflictions, extend boundless lifespan, and expand boundless fields of merit. They will enjoy prosperity in every life and happiness in every rebirth. One must always revere it, copy it, and circulate it to benefit all beings—this is immeasurable. Its height reaches beyond the Nine Heavens, and its depth penetrates below the Nine Earths. Myriad transformations and infinite changes of the Dao are fully contained within it. If one can receive, uphold, read, and recite this sutra with an unwavering mind, they will attain boundless wisdom, accumulate boundless good causes, eradicate boundless karmic obstacles, dispel boundless afflictions, extend boundless lifespan, and expand boundless fields of merit. They will enjoy prosperity in every life and happiness in every rebirth. One must always revere it, copy it, and circulate it to benefit all beings—this is immeasurable. The perfected ones, upon hearing this, believe, accept, and practice it.

Thus concludes the *Taishang Dongxuan Lingbao Sanyuan Wuliangshou Jing*.
